body.p: “Within “,” the scales are a dark brown above (i.e. as it hangs) and a light brown beneath “,” very distinctly being marked beneath by the same darker brown “,” down the centre and near the apex somewhat anchorwise.”
PE 9, pg. 234 / 3 Sept 1854 – 12 May 1855 / NNPM MA 1302:24 / T vol. # XVIII / PDF # XIII
